mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLDER_T WHERE OWNER_NO = #{ownerNo} AND PARENT_FOLDER_NO IS NULL
SELECT FOLDER_NO, FOLDER_NAME, FOLDER_CREATE_DT, FOLDER_UPLOAD_PATH, PARENT_FOLDER_NO, OWNER_NO FROM FOLDER_T

SELECT FI.FILE_NO, FI.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, FI.FILESYSTEM_NAME, FI.ORIGINAL_FILENAME, FI.FILE_UPLOAD_DT, FI.OWNER_NO, FO.FOLDER_NO, FO.FOLDER_NAME, FO.PARENT_FOLDER_NO FROM FILE_T FI INNER JOIN FOLDER_T FO ON FI.FOLDER_NO = FO.FOLDER_NO ORDER BY FO.FOLDER_NO
